name: Abstraction World
description: Pop Art, Kitsch, and the phenomenon of streetwear and sneakers subcultures are used as topics because there are similarities that are subversive, reconstructing what has been discoursed by authoritarians, but not out of technical conventions, and working collaboratively between conventional, radical, free, innovative work methods. , and tends to be complex when all values ​​from aspects of art and business, health in competence are demonstrated in an elegant and academic way. Contemporary art paradigms as well as the discourses within them still make this subcultural phenomenon enter into it and continue to be explored and initiated by contemporary artists around the world to this day. This strengthens the topic that will serve as the basic basis for the problem, which is still relevant and has its own capacity and space in contemporary art today.
